title: Organizational Leadership and Civic Competency Enhancement Program Using Remote Collaborative Learning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Understands basic organizational management concepts and possesses intermediate-level application skills. Requires foundational understanding of social relationships and civic rights
context.additional_context: Adaptation to remote collaboration scenarios via computer-supported collaborative learning in BYOD environments. Exploration of effective communication strategies and institutional improvement plans among culturally diverse learners.

learning_goals: Using real-time asynchronous collaboration tools, learners achieve ≥80% participation in solving complex organizational scenarios and conducting social relationship analysis.
Teams visually represent decision-making processes using digital whiteboards and shared document tools, incorporating cultural diversity considerations.
Through formative assessments, learners reflect on ≥3 feedback sessions to improve leadership styles during collaboration and cultivate civic consciousness.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
